channel.title: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA
channel.description:
[center][img]http://saradomin.com/images/logo.png[/img] | [url=http://saradomin.com]Home[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/forums]Forums[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/play.php]Play[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar]Download[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/vote.php]Vote[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/scores]Scores[/url] |
[size=5]Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that's packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.
At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that's exclusive to our server. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.
If you have been looking for these things, you've found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence! [/size]
[spoiler=Staff Team]Chris Ruzylo - Manager - CFO - Owner Pseudo - Developer Eric - Developer Ivo - Developer Saad - Web Developer[/spoiler] [spoiler=Updates] 7-16 -7-20 -Fixed the forums nav bar and overall layout. -Added a new recent topics plugin. Might remove the recent topics one entirely. -Added a new vote system. -Added players online on the home page. -Working on ::email (password recovery). -Reorganized the site. It's much cleaner now. -Fixed FunPK -You dont recieve PkP in fun PK anymore, stops boosters -Fixed Wilderness sending messages about using emotes in wild/teleporting in wild -Fixed summoning obelisk only being accessible on one side -FIxed Zekes trading -Fixed the general store trading -at 4 Infractions your account will be banned -Fixed report abuse screen - Made progress towards fixing the Combat 'run away'/noclip bug. - Fixed the monkey pnpc issue at Ape Atoll Agility. - No longer get trapped in the wall at Taverly dungeon. - Slayer gem now displays kills left correct. -Fixed corp attacking styles -Randomized corp attacks -Fixed corp attacking through armour -Fixed combat death bug Quests now also automaticly Update without Relogging ( the colors ) [ * FIXED * ] -Few remaining point value bugs [ * FIXED * ] -Players Online updating in quest tab [ * FIXED * ] -Wizzy boots drop to frequent [ * FIXED * ] -Dung NPCS don't respawn -All 3 Barrows glitchs -News is glitched [ * FIXED * ] -Rune Jav Animation [ * FIXED * ] -When you use the Make-Over Mage, you will turn invisible. -After you start a quest, you cannot open the quest info anymore. (At least for me[Neal]) -Report Abuse screen is glitched. -When you run out of Run, it will stay at 0%. [ * FIXED * ] ( at 0, click run again in the Settings tab :) ) -When you Right-Click an Enchanted Gem and click Kills-left you wield the gem. -Right-Click Trade Zeke opens Advanced Summoning Shop. [ * FIXED * ] -When stuff dies, their deaths are glitched. [ * FIXED THE NPCS I WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT * ] -Herblore [ * FIXED * ] -FOllowing
7-16 updates
FIxed Maggie's not closing the dialogue after some of the teleport options are clicked -Added Tok Haar Kal into the Server -Added Ragefire, Steadfast, and Glaiven boots into the Server -FIxed the Zaryte bow ( it now acts as a more powerful Crystal bow of sorts ) -Fixed the RFD chest bug -Added Quick Chatting skills when you click on one in the Skills Tab -Fixed Wizzy boots and other items in Point Shops with no value -Fixed wolf bones being able to be used for Prayer -Right clicking shops
7-15 updates
-Client launcher- Basically every time i upload a new jar, and you guys run the launcher it'll automatically run the new one, -Moved home to from edgeville to Faladore -Moved Npcs/Objects to Falador -Remade the quest, A Recipe for DIsaster -Added Gloves rewards to A Recipe for Disaster -Fixed the glitch in Dwarf Cannon quest -Fixed what regions you can set up a dwarf cannon ( must be in a multi zone ) -Fixed the tutorial bug -Fixed the starter bug -Redid the quest tab completely -Added action buttons for all quest tab options -Redid Slayer/Vote/PkP stores -Pest control has been made to work 100% now. Also added the rewards exchanges -Fixed funPk bug -Fixed buying X amount bug -Fixed buying amounts of 10 bug -Fixed right clicking shops -Fixed the invisible character bug with Make Over Mage -Fixed the blank emote tab -Fixed the prayer switching bug -Fixed the Ape Atoll Agility bug -Fixed Revenant respawning bug -Fixed the skillcape buying bugs -Fixed the glitched thieving stall and exp gains -Added RFD chest -Redid most of the prices for items awarded through donating -Added Dragon Implings and Torm demons to Donator Zone -Added a teleport that gives 20 KC for GWD in Donator Zone -Fixed "Total TIme Online" in quest tab -Fixed clan chat kicking you everytime you log out, you will not be in the same cc when you log back in ( easier for Pk clans ect ) -Fixed bugs pertaining to Maggie -Changed online text color from green to blue. -Change many announcement text colors from green to blue. -Reworked and reorganized the website files (Doesn't effect you guys.) -Loader uploaded to the website in replace of the direct download(Credits to Stuart for the loader) -Fixed the cache slightly. -Added 4 more images to the client backgrounds. -Removed the black blank section during the third to first image. -Remade an image to help show text easier. -Changed the image of the soldiers and the flags. -Uploaded new cache and jar.
[/spoiler] [spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/login.gif[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/6.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=5]Currently in beta! Current Estimated Release Date = July 30th[/size] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:13, topic:545037”]Why am I still listed as developer/ owner? o.O[/quote]Nerd. Ill fix it later

-Bump updated update log, added more images, fixed/updated staff list.

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:11, topic:545037”][quote author=Ruzylo link=topic=663915.msg4439091#msg4439091 date=1405967345]

you can say bye bye to that domain if this gets popular
[/quote]Unlike most rsps owners. I’d rather take it to court. More then likely they’d give up before anything, simply because they’d lose more then they’d gain simply by just showing up even if they won. But if it gets bigger ill talk to a lawyer about how to avoid the issues legally from happening anyhow.

You’re using their intellectual property and you’re not a Limited Liability Company so they can and will sue you for personal possessions.[/quote]Right. But thats not what your getting. Read above. Its not as simple as Hey I sue you give me money. You pay the judge, the court system, im in us, them in the uk, so add on whatever they need to to even get it to a point to sue. They would most likely win(actualy theres quite abit to use ageanst them where They wouldnt but lets just go off probability), but bye the time they do, they would have lost ALOT more then they would be able to gain. And jagex knows that, thats why majority of the time they just attempt to seize the domain. Throw some pretty insane threats out, and keep pushing, where it has never gotten to the point of court. And majority of the time people let it happen. My step father is part of the high tech crime unit for handling cases such as this. I have done my research and know what to do in an event such as this.

Edit:
-Sorry for grammar and errors, on iphone.

Read full topic
item.source: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA

item.title: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Ruzylo, post:10, topic:545037”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=663915.msg4439061#msg4439061 date=1405963006]
you can say bye bye to that domain if this gets popular
[/quote]Unlike most rsps owners. I’d rather take it to court. More then likely they’d give up before anything, simply because they’d lose more then they’d gain simply by just showing up even if they won. But if it gets bigger ill talk to a lawyer about how to avoid the issues legally from happening anyhow.[/quote]

You’re using their intellectual property and you’re not a Limited Liability Company so they can and will sue you for personal possessions.

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[center]
| Home | Forums | Play | Download | Vote | Scores |

[size=5]Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that’s packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.

At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that’s exclusive to our server. We’re constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.

If you have been looking for these things, you’ve found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence!
[/size]

[spoiler=Staff Team]Chris Ruzylo - Manager - CFO - Owner
Pseudo - Developer
Eric - Developer
Ivo - Developer
Saad - Web Developer[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Updates]
7-16 -7-20
-Fixed the forums nav bar and overall layout.
-Added a new recent topics plugin. Might remove the recent topics one entirely.
-Added a new vote system.
-Added players online on the home page.
-Working on ::email (password recovery).
-Reorganized the site. It’s much cleaner now.
-Fixed FunPK
-You dont recieve PkP in fun PK anymore, stops boosters
-Fixed Wilderness sending messages about using emotes in wild/teleporting in wild
-Fixed summoning obelisk only being accessible on one side
-FIxed Zekes trading
-Fixed the general store trading
-at 4 Infractions your account will be banned
-Fixed report abuse screen

  • Made progress towards fixing the Combat ‘run away’/noclip bug.
  • Fixed the monkey pnpc issue at Ape Atoll Agility.
  • No longer get trapped in the wall at Taverly dungeon.
  • Slayer gem now displays kills left correct.
    -Fixed corp attacking styles
    -Randomized corp attacks
    -Fixed corp attacking through armour
    -Fixed combat death bug
    Quests now also automaticly Update without Relogging ( the colors ) [ * FIXED * ]
    -Few remaining point value bugs [ * FIXED * ]
    -Players Online updating in quest tab [ * FIXED * ]
    -Wizzy boots drop to frequent [ * FIXED * ]
    -Dung NPCS don’t respawn
    -All 3 Barrows glitchs
    -News is glitched [ * FIXED * ]
    -Rune Jav Animation [ * FIXED * ]
    -When you use the Make-Over Mage, you will turn invisible.
    -After you start a quest, you cannot open the quest info anymore. (At least for me[Neal])
    -Report Abuse screen is glitched.
    -When you run out of Run, it will stay at 0%. [ * FIXED * ] ( at 0, click run again in the Settings tab )
    -When you Right-Click an Enchanted Gem and click Kills-left you wield the gem.
    -Right-Click Trade Zeke opens Advanced Summoning Shop. [ * FIXED * ]
    -When stuff dies, their deaths are glitched. [ * FIXED THE NPCS I WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT * ]
    -Herblore [ * FIXED * ]
    -FOllowing

7-16 updates

FIxed Maggie’s not closing the dialogue after some of the teleport options are clicked
-Added Tok Haar Kal into the Server
-Added Ragefire, Steadfast, and Glaiven boots into the Server
-FIxed the Zaryte bow ( it now acts as a more powerful Crystal bow of sorts )
-Fixed the RFD chest bug
-Added Quick Chatting skills when you click on one in the Skills Tab
-Fixed Wizzy boots and other items in Point Shops with no value
-Fixed wolf bones being able to be used for Prayer
-Right clicking shops

7-15 updates

-Client launcher- Basically every time i upload a new jar, and you guys run the launcher it’ll automatically run the new one,
-Moved home to from edgeville to Faladore
-Moved Npcs/Objects to Falador
-Remade the quest, A Recipe for DIsaster
-Added Gloves rewards to A Recipe for Disaster
-Fixed the glitch in Dwarf Cannon quest
-Fixed what regions you can set up a dwarf cannon ( must be in a multi zone )
-Fixed the tutorial bug
-Fixed the starter bug
-Redid the quest tab completely
-Added action buttons for all quest tab options
-Redid Slayer/Vote/PkP stores
-Pest control has been made to work 100% now. Also added the rewards exchanges
-Fixed funPk bug
-Fixed buying X amount bug
-Fixed buying amounts of 10 bug
-Fixed right clicking shops
-Fixed the invisible character bug with Make Over Mage
-Fixed the blank emote tab
-Fixed the prayer switching bug
-Fixed the Ape Atoll Agility bug
-Fixed Revenant respawning bug
-Fixed the skillcape buying bugs
-Fixed the glitched thieving stall and exp gains
-Added RFD chest
-Redid most of the prices for items awarded through donating
-Added Dragon Implings and Torm demons to Donator Zone
-Added a teleport that gives 20 KC for GWD in Donator Zone
-Fixed “Total TIme Online” in quest tab
-Fixed clan chat kicking you everytime you log out, you will not be in the same cc when you log back in ( easier for Pk clans ect )
-Fixed bugs pertaining to Maggie
-Changed online text color from green to blue.
-Change many announcement text colors from green to blue.
-Reworked and reorganized the website files (Doesn’t effect you guys.)
-Loader uploaded to the website in replace of the direct download(Credits to Stuart for the loader)
-Fixed the cache slightly.
-Added 4 more images to the client backgrounds.
-Removed the black blank section during the third to first image.
-Remade an image to help show text easier.
-Changed the image of the soldiers and the flags.
-Uploaded new cache and jar.

[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media]







[/spoiler]

[size=5]Currently in beta!
Current Estimated Release Date = July 30th[/size]
[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Saradomin ~ Time to join the fight! A server with a future! BETA
